Package jpa.services

Class DepartmentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • jpa.services.BaseService<Department,​java.lang.Long,​DepartmentRepo>
      • jpa.services.DepartmentService
  • public class DepartmentService
extends BaseService<Department,​java.lang.Long,​DepartmentRepo>
    Class that models from DepartmentDTO using DepartmentMapper to be intermediary between the DepartmentController and the database
    Author:
    sps169, FedericoTB
